en_text: For 1 turn, increase ATK by 30% for each Enhanced Fire Att. and Enhanced Wood Att. awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: 絶対 死なせない！
jp_skill.raw_description: 1ターンの間、チーム内の火と木属性強化の 覚醒数に応じて攻撃力が上昇。

kr_skill.name: I won't let you die!
kr_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Enhanced Fire, Wood Att.] Awoken Skills in team for 1 turn

na_skill.name: I won't let you die!
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Enhanced Fire, Wood Att.] Awoken Skills in team for 1 turn
